name: STAIRS

address: STAIRS, B 55 A,Ground Floor, Kalkaji, New Delhi 110029

briefDescription: STAIRS is a not-for-profit, Non-Governmental, Non- Religious & Non-Political organization working towards sports, education and health of underprivileged children across various urban and rural areas of India. Stairs is driven by the mission to facilitate the process of creating an enabling environment for the poor and underprivileged youth to discover their realities and provide support system to elevate them. Its vision is to guide underprivileged youth towards development and channelize their energy into meaningful activities thus bringing about a positive and constructive thinking and prosperity. Empowering youth STAIRS have engaged 2 lakh under privileged children through 400 sports centers across six states of India.
